articles.title: Hungarian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
articles.content:
Hungarian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Hungarian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 55th Anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was held in Budapest on August 14.
 At the ceremony Chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party Gyula Thurmer was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from September 1 to 10 and decided to hold a celebration meeting, photo exhibition and other functions during the period.

DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Appointed
    Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Han Chun was appointed as the new DPRK ambassador to Cambodia, according to the decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

Working-level Contact for Reconnecting Inter-Korean Rail and Road Links
articles.content:
Working-level Contact for Reconnecting Inter-Korean Rail and Road Links
    Kaesong, August 22 (KCNA) -- The sixth working-level contact for reconnecting the rail and road links between the north and the south of Korea was held in Kaesong from August 21 to 22.
 At the contact both sides adopted an agreement on working-level contact after making sincere discussions on practical issues in order to energetically push forward the projects for reconnecting the rail and road links between the north and the south now underway amid the great expectation and concern of the whole nation, including the issue of providing all the equipment and raw materials necessary for the projects from October, the issue of giving such technical services as installing, repairing and servicing the already provided equipment and vehicles, the issue of working out designs of signals, telecommunications and power system, a basic agreement on train service and the issue of setting up offices for train and motor operation.    
 Both sides agreed to discuss and fix the date of the 7th working-level contact by way of exchanging documents in future.
